member.name: M:Leptonica.InteropNet.LibraryLoader.CheckCurrentAppDomainBin(System.String,System.String)
member.remarks:
Note that this makes a couple of assumptions these being:
That the current application domain's location for web applications corresponds to the web applications root directory.
That the tesseract\leptonica dlls reside in the corresponding x86 or x64 directories in the bin directory under the apps root directory.

member.name: F:Leptonica.RotationFill.White
member.summary: Bring in white pixels from the outside.

member.name: F:Leptonica.RotationFill.Black
member.summary: Bring in black pixels from the outside.

members.member: Use area map rotation, if possible. sick compiler of god damn Microsoft
